name: basket tote
notes:
meet this beautiful and easy crochet basket - instant download

beautiful and functional basket tote is fast and fun to make in an evening!  this basket is useful as a display piece and also functions as a tote.  

note: this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own lovely crochet basket with handles.

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog
> [here][1].  the benefit of purchasing
> this pdf is an easy to read,
> printable, and ad-free version of the
> pattern.

materials needed:

* super bulky #6 weight yarn 
* crochet hook size l/8.00 mm
* stitch marker (optional but helpful)
* tapestry needle and scissors

yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact, just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn. 

basket size: approximately 10” across and 9-1/2” tall

pattern will be available for instant download upon payment.

the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too. this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal, non-commercial use only. you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances.

due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.


  [1]: https://www.crochet365knittoo.com/crochet-basket/
